vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Related to: κομψ-ότης, ητος, ἡ,
elegance, prettiness, daintiness, especially of language, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; κ. ἱστορική, φυσική, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sentirse mejor, mejorar, recuperarse, reponerse (de una enfermedad)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sức khỏe khá hơn; khỏe lại; sức khỏe tốt hơn
